mapper.sql: SELECT N.NO, N.TITLE, M.U_NO, N.WRITER_NO, N.CONTENT, N.CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.WRITER_NO = M.U_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y';
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT N.NO, N.TITLE, N.WRITER_NO, M.U_NO, N.CONTENT, N.CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.WRITER_NO = M.U_NO) WHERE N.STATUS='Y' AND N.NO=#{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NO, WRITER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writerNo}, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, WHERE NO=#{no}
